ComicInfo.Summary: The Mirror War [Part 2]: Picard is enraged to find that one of his personal stashes of wealth has been robbed by the thief known as the Obnoxious Okana. Picard and the Enterprise set out to track down Okana, unaware that they are being tracked by a Klingon ship commanded by Regent Worf, who intends to recover the dilithium shipment stolen by Picard's crew. Picard's actions are also being monitored by a pirate raider ship commanded by Benjamin Sisko.
